I think Porocles was on the right track.  If there is consistently a mismatch with patch versions, something is weird.  Its like the patcher is updating itself, and thinks its updated properly, but then when the client double-checks it, it finds out it actually wasn't.  

Given that the Permissions Guide didn't help, you might want to do a [full and clean re-installation](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040) at this point.  This will ensure that the installation itself is not the root cause the problem.

Let us know if it still doesn't help!
